original_title: VIVA A ARARA AZUL E A FAUNA BRASILEIRA! -  CACHOEIRINHA
overview: The children participating in the  workshop defend the importance of protecting animals from the  Brazilian fauna, such as the hyacinth macaw, and show their skills with  makeup and special effects.
title: VIVA A ARARA AZUL E A FAUNA BRASILEIRA! -  CACHOEIRINHA
